Consumption of Ashwagandha has some benefits and some disadvantages for our bodies. If you use Ashwagandha more. So it harms your body. Diarrhea can also cause problems like loose motions.

Apart from the stomach, Ashwagandha can also affect your blood pressure. If you are consuming ashwagandha in excess, it can increase your blood pressure. If you consume more Ashwagandha. So you may suffer from problems like vomiting, diarrhea, and nausea.
